name: Gone Witchin'
description:
Welcome to Gone Witchin'! 

This is a small, sandbox game made for Mini Jame Gam #8. 

You play as a magical witch who is spending their time in the witchy woods to hone their potion making skill! 

The objective is to mix the reagents you brought with you to create magical potions in your trusty cauldron! 

There are over 25 potions to brew, all made by combining the reagents and stirring with her magical oar!

This game was made by a group of friends who had never made a game before. Nearly every asset was made completely from scratch and we're very proud of what we've been able to accomplish in the last two days!
